snippet.title: These Doomed Isles | Play The Demo Now!
snippet.description:
These Doomed Isles is a survival city-builder with deckbuilding mechanics and elements of tower defence. 

We have a demo available to play on Steam right now and it will be available until the 26th of September so take the chance to get a first look at the game.

Fireshine games is also proud to announce we are the ones publishing These Doomed Isles and we are really excited to work with Andrew at Triplevision Games on this special project.
